title: What would've happened or changed if Neji never died? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well (after Hinata's speech), Naruto wouldn't have realized: although some of his comrades are dead, they are still alive in his heart. Losing Neji allowed Naruto to understand Obito a bit more. The end result with Naruto and Hinata would still be the same because they already had feelings for one another that wouldn't be acknowledged until The Last. Neji might have a family, or might not.
